title: If any area fulfills the condition laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as a slum area and has been censused or declared and notified shall be deemed to be and treated as DRP Area
clause_text: If any area fulfills the condition laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as a slum area and has been censused or declared and notified shall be deemed to be and treated as DRP Area.
section: Definition of Slum, Pavement, Structure of hut, planning sectors and related terms:

source_pdf.text_snippet: If any area fulfills the condition laid down in section 4 of the Slum Act to qualify as a slum area and has been censused or declared and notified shall be deemed to be and treated as DRP Area.
